name: Organiser
description:
Select some layers, run the plugin, set your spacing, hit organise.


Organiser (or Organizer) if you like your words with zs in them. Is a Figma plugin that will make your files just a little bit better.


Layers are automatically sorted into grids and rows based on where they are on the canvas. You can change the order of layers with our minimap.


I was dared to make a plugin in a day by Luis. How did we do that? By being organised of course!!


Disclaimer, it actually took a weekend, because we wanted to add cool features no other plugin had like a draggable minimap.



Created by Luke Finch and Luis Ouriach
